Klant fires rifle like shots, 2 of them, at Razorclaw. Tarantopulous ignore=
s the battle altogether and just runs off. Airbomber fires a pistol 3 times=
 at Divebomb. Train Wreck, Instrat, and Train Wreck each follow suit, each =
one of them firing 3 times at Divebomb. (Divebomb's got 12 shots coming his=
 way) Arrow fires at Razorclaw 4 times. The Radicons glaring at him angrily=
.

Arrow: Asinine scrap metal.

Airbomber: I think he was talking to us.

S=
tranato nods and they glare at Arrow.

Airbomber: Your kid too good for thi=
s battle?

Arrow: Too bad for this battle.

Airbomber: ou're too bad for th=
is battle.

Train Wreck: Save it, Airbomber.

Airbomber: For what?

Arrow: =
I get it, this is all against me, isn't it. All of you Radicons, against me=
. You are effing hilarious, hohoho! I thought we were in this together, but=
 I guess I was wrong.

Airbomber: About right...
  ----- Original Message -=

  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunda=
y, April 01, 2001 10:31 PM
  Subject: WAR!!!


  :::The Protectrons/Torca/R=
atchet/Sideswipe/Sky 
  Lynx/Orion/Hun-Grr/Cyclonus/Scourge/Fracas/Wheeljac=
k/Banzai-Tron/Hurricane/Hel 

  lbat/Batbreast::: 

  ::My Maximals see the=
 battle going on.  They look for Targets:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Brainstorm fires 2=
 photon charges from each gun at Rippersnapper:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Chromedome f=
ires 25 rapid laser blasts from each gun at Razorclaw:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Hardh=
ead fires 25 crystal shards from each gun at Rampage:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Highbr=
ow fires a stream of acid from each gun at Divebomb:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Torca s=
witches his dorsal gun to nail gun and fires 25 nails at Sinnertwin:: 
  ~~=
~~~ 
  ::Ratchet fires 2 tusk missles and 15 shots from each blaster at Tan=
trum:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Sideswipe fires 25 shots and 2 missles at Headstrong::=
 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Sky Lynx fires 2 missles from each gun at FireBlade:: 
  ~~~=
~~ 
  ::Orion looked to Hun-Grr:: 
  Orion: Hey there ugly, ya wanna piece =
of me? 
  Hun-grr: No, Hun-grr want whole thing! 
  ::They fire at each oth=
er:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Cyclonus and Scourge arrive at the CF:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Cy=
clonus fires 25 rapid laser blasts at Prowl:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  Scourge: Fracas! =

  ::Fracas deploys, and Scourge fires 2 missles from Fracas at Grimmler:: =

  ~~~~~ 
  ::My Alliance members reach the CF.  Wheeljack reports to Zardu=
s:: 
  Wheeljack: I have arrived Zardus.  Do you have any orders for me? 
 =
 ::The others immeadiately find their target:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Banzai-Tron fi=
res 2 missles at Megaton:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Hurricane fires 15 lightning bolts=
 at Megaton:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  Hellbat: Batbreast, attack! 
  ::Batbreast deploy=
s and tries to suck Megaton's mech fluid::
